item.title: 如何使用Hugo搭建个人博客网站【Mac端】
item.description: 【打开终端】 一、使用brew安装Hugo * 需要提前下载安装brew，网上有详细教程。 brew install hugo hugo version * 查看Hugo版本，安装完成。 二、使用Hugo生成一个博客网站 hugo new site myblog * Hugo为你创建了一个myblog文件夹，你网站的所有数据都将储存在这个文件夹当中。 示例： “Congratulations! Your new Hugo site is created in /Users/juanjuanli/mybolog. Just a few more steps and you're ready to go: 1. Download a theme into the same-named folder. Choose a theme from https://themes.gohugo.io/ or create your own with the "hugo new theme <THEMENAME>" command. 2. Perhaps you want to add some content.
